title: Altar of Zamorak

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Altar of Zamorak is the altar found within the church of Slepe. Just as the rest of the town of Slepe, the altar is dedicated to Zamorak. Praying at the altar will recharge a player's prayer points.

content:
Altar of Zamorak
Released24 May 2018 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNone
LocationSlepe church
OptionsPray-at
ExamineShrine to the glory of Zamorak.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID32630

The Altar of Zamorak is the altar found within the church of Slepe. Just as the rest of the town of Slepe, the altar is dedicated to Zamorak. Praying at the altar will recharge a player's prayer points.

The church where the altar can be found.
The altar within the church.

The '''Altar of Zamorak''' is the altar found within the church of [[Slepe]]. Just as the rest of the town of Slepe, the altar is dedicated to [[Zamorak]]. Praying at the altar will recharge a player's [[prayer]] points.
[[File:Slepe church.png|thumb|left|The church where the altar can be found.]]
[[File:Slepe church interior.png|thumb|left|The altar within the church.]]

{{Prayer}}
{{Slepe}}
